data.title: Biography of Vladislaus II King Hungary 1456-1516
data.meta_description: Biography of Vladislaus II King Hungary 1456-1516 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 29 Jun 1440 [his father] Casimir IV King Poland (age 12) succeeded IV King Poland.

On 10 Feb 1454 [his father] Casimir IV King Poland (age 26) and [his mother] Elisabeth Habsburg Queen Consort Poland (age 16) were married. She the daughter of Albert Habsburg V Duke Austria 1397-1439 and Elizabeth Luxemburg Duchess Austria 1409-1442.

On 01 Mar 1456 Vladislaus II King Hungary was born to Casimir IV King Poland (age 28) and Elisabeth Habsburg Queen Consort Poland (age 18).

On 07 Jun 1492 [his father] Casimir IV King Poland (age 64) died. His son Vladislaus II King Hungary (age 36) succeeded II King Hungary.

Before 29 Sep 1502 Vladislaus II King Hungary (age 46) and Anna Foix Queen Consort of Hungary and Bohemia (age 18) were married. The difference in their ages was 27 years.

On 23 Jul 1503 [his daughter] Anne Jagiellon Holy Roman Empress was born to Vladislaus II King Hungary (age 47) and [his wife] Anna Foix Queen Consort of Hungary and Bohemia (age 19).

In 1505 [his mother] Elisabeth Habsburg Queen Consort Poland (age 67) died.

On 26 Jul 1506 [his wife] Anna Foix Queen Consort of Hungary and Bohemia (age 22) died.
